name: The Figure in the Pantry
description:
You're just an insomniac that's stressed out from work. You can't sleep so why not eat? But something decides it wants to interrupt your late night snack.

This isn't a horror game really. More like a comedic "I can't handle this right now" type thing. I can't write horror.

It's a little experimental when it comes to the visual style.

A short game made within the soft deadline of season 1 episode 2 of the RELIQUARY WEEKLY JAMS.
